name: Sinking Pirates
description:
Hold on tight, Sailor! Your pirate ship is sinking and you can't swim. Climb as high as you can, avoiding obstacles and knocking down pirate sharks that cross your path. Beware, the purple shark is more dangerous than it looks!

It's very easy to play! Touch the screen to swap sides and swipe to use your Super Dash!

Features:
• Play with several characters!
• Unlock new sceneries!
• Challenge your friends!
• Avoid obstacles, sharks and flying barrels!
• Activate your super dash to destroy everything!
• Test your reflexes with simple one-touch controls!
• Complete the missions to become King of the Pirates!
